name: Book Reccommender App
description: AI enhanced book reccommendation web application.
keyFeatures: Fully responsive design that adapts to all screen sizes and devices.
Custom UI components for a unique and professional look.
AI Machine learning models for content bsed and collaborative filtering to give more accurate reccomendations.

name: Book Seller Platform
description: A platform to explore, review, and rate books effortlessly online.
keyFeatures: Secure payment gateway integration using Stripe for easy and safe transactions.
User authentication system for secure logins and account management.
Admin panel for managing products, orders, and user accounts.

name: Mental Wellness App
description: A full-stack social media application with real-time chat and posts.
keyFeatures: Post sharing, commenting, and liking features to increase user engagement.

name: ICU Patient Monitoring System
description: Vital Watch is a smart ICU patient monitoring system designed to replace traditional paper records with digital monitoring.
keyFeatures: Drag-and-drop UI for easily organizing tasks and prioritizing them.
Real-time synchronization across devices to keep all users up to date.
Task categorization and filtering for better task management.

name: Medisense
description: A comprehensive web-based management system developed for Medisense Laboratory Pvt Ltd
keyFeatures: Support for writing blogs in Markdown format for easy content creation.
User authentication and authorization system for secure login and account access.
Commenting system for users to interact with blog posts.

name: Inventory Management App
description: A web-based system developed to streamline event planning and inventory management
keyFeatures: Displays current weather conditions for any location using geolocation or search.
Real-time weather updates using data from OpenWeather API.
